projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Personal portfolio website built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features responsive design, smooth animations, and modern UI components. Includes project showcase, blog integration, and contact forms.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with React frontend and Node.js backend. Features include user authentication, product catalog, shopping cart, payment processing with Stripe, and admin dashboard for inventory management.

projects.title: Flutter Mobile App
projects.description: Cross-platform mobile application built with Flutter and Dart. Implements BLoC pattern for state management, Firebase for backend services, and features offline capability with local data persistence.

projects.title: AI Data Dashboard
projects.description: Machine learning dashboard with Python FastAPI backend and React frontend. Provides real-time data visualization, predictive analytics, and interactive charts for business intelligence and data-driven decision making.

projects.title: Microservices Architecture
projects.description: Distributed system built with microservices architecture using Docker containers. Includes API gateway, service discovery, load balancing with Traefik, and monitoring with comprehensive logging and metrics collection.

projects.title: 3D Game with Unity
projects.description: Interactive 3D game developed using Unity game engine and C# programming. Features physics-based gameplay, particle effects, sound design, and cross-platform deployment for Windows, Mac, and mobile devices.

projects.title: Next.js Blog Platform
projects.description: Modern blog platform built with Next.js, featuring server-side rendering, SEO optimization, markdown support, commenting system, and content management. Includes dark mode, search functionality, and social sharing.

projects.title: AWS Serverless App
projects.description: Serverless web application deployed on AWS using Lambda functions, API Gateway, and DynamoDB. Implements Infrastructure as Code with AWS CDK, automated CI/CD pipeline, and monitoring with CloudWatch.

projects.title: GraphQL API Service
projects.description: RESTful API converted to GraphQL with advanced features including real-time subscriptions, data caching, query optimization, and comprehensive testing. Built with Apollo Server and integrated with multiple data sources.

projects.title: 3D Visualization with Three.js
projects.description: Interactive 3D data visualization application using Three.js and WebGL. Features real-time 3D charts, particle systems, interactive controls, and WebGL shaders for stunning visual effects and smooth performance.
